post.description: Give A User Access to the Application
This will confirm the otp sent to the user and also create a new password for the user
Requires Authorization header with Bearer token.
Get a new access token by using the refresh token

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer token"
Bearer.name: Authorization
